opendial.bn.distribs.discrete

Class DeterministicDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.bn.distribs.discrete.DeterministicDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiscreteDistribution, ProbDistribution

    public class DeterministicDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiscreteDistribution
    A deterministic distribution derived from the specification of a specific function.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-01-30 22:55:33 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      Returns the distribution.
      CategoricalTable getPosterior(Assignment condition)
      Returns a categorical table with one unique element (with probability 1.0), namely the value associated with the conditional assignment for the deterministic function.

      Returns DISCRETE.
      double getProb(Assignment condition, Assignment head)
      Returns the probability P(head|condition) -- which in this case is either 1.0 if head is the function output for condition, or 0.0 otherwise.

      Generates all possible input assignments for the input values (expensive operation!)

      • getProb

        public double getProb(Assignment condition,
             Assignment head)
        Returns the probability P(head|condition) -- which in this case is either 1.0 if head is the function output for condition, or 0.0 otherwise.
